segments.text: I love watching the children in this scene; they're so full of life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little boy is quite inventive, using that stool to get to the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching himself to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister, the girl, is a perfect accomplice, ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is outstretched, palm open, in a clear gesture of expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've got a great little team going on, a true partnership in crime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get some delicious cookies without being caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool does look incredibly precarious, which makes me a bit nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't heard any of their rustling or whispers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is exactly the kind of secret adventure kids dream of.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their sweet prize, oblivious to the water behind them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wonderful moment of childhood daring and cooperation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They deserve those cookies for their bravery, even if it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR
